keyMoments.title: Franky vs Baby 5 and Buffalo
keyMoments.description: Franky engages in battle with Baby 5 and Buffalo using his General Franky mech to prevent them from retrieving Caesar Clown.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Franky's role as the defensive line protecting the escaping Straw Hats and their allies.

keyMoments.title: General Shield Debut
keyMoments.description: Franky uses the General Shield for the first time, detaching General Franky's shoulder to create a defensive shield.
keyMoments.significance: First demonstration of General Franky's defensive capabilities.

keyMoments.title: General Shield Boomerang Debut
keyMoments.description: Franky throws the General Shield as a projectile, though it is destroyed by Baby 5 and Buffalo.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Franky's creative use of defensive tools for offense.

keyMoments.title: General Left Debut
keyMoments.description: Franky shoots bullets from General Franky's arm using four gun barrels.
keyMoments.significance: Adds to General Franky's ranged combat arsenal.

keyMoments.title: General Cannon Debut
keyMoments.description: Franky unleashes General Franky's most powerful attack, firing a massive blast of compressed air that damages Baby 5, Buffalo, and the surrounding ice mountains.
keyMoments.significance: First use of General Franky's ultimate weapon, comparable to the Thousand Sunny's Gaon Cannon.

abilities.description: Franky detaches General Franky's shoulder piece to use as a shield, which can also be thrown as a projectile.
The General Shield thrown as a boomerang projectile.
Franky shoots bullets from General Franky's arm via four gun barrels.
General Franky's ultimate attack that fires a giant blast of compressed air, described as an on-land version of the Thousand Sunny's Gaon Cannon.

reveals.information: General Franky possesses multiple combat techniques including shield, projectile, and cannon attacks

keyMoments.title: Battle Against Franky
keyMoments.description: Baby 5, alongside Buffalo, battles Franky's General Franky mech in an attempt to retrieve Caesar Clown for Doflamingo.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases Baby 5's combat role as a member of the Donquixote Pirates.

keyMoments.title: Weapon Transformation Abilities
keyMoments.description: Baby 5 demonstrates multiple transformation forms including Espada Girl (sword form) and Missile Girl, which Buffalo launches at General Franky.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the versatility and team-attack potential of her Buki Buki no Mi Devil Fruit.

abilities.description: Baby 5 transforms into a large sword that can be wielded or launched as a projectile.
Baby 5 transforms into a missile that Buffalo can launch at enemies, causing explosive damage.

reveals.information: Can transform into sword and missile forms using Buki Buki no Mi

keyMoments.title: Battle Against Franky
keyMoments.description: Buffalo, alongside Baby 5, battles Franky's General Franky mech using his Guru Guru no Mi spinning abilities.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Buffalo's role as Baby 5's partner in combat.

keyMoments.title: Team Attack with Baby 5
keyMoments.description: Buffalo uses his spinning abilities to launch Baby 5 in her weapon forms at General Franky, showcasing their teamwork.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the synergy between Buffalo's Guru Guru no Mi and Baby 5's Buki Buki no Mi.

reveals.information: Can use spinning abilities to launch Baby 5's weapon forms as projectiles

keyMoments.title: Accepts Doflamingo's Order
keyMoments.description: Monet receives and accepts Doflamingo's order to activate Punk Hazard's self-destruct mechanism, apologizing for her failure and committing to sacrifice herself.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Monet's absolute loyalty to Doflamingo and willingness to die for his cause.
keyMoments.quote: You will be the next Pirate King.

keyMoments.title: Activates Self-Destruct
keyMoments.description: Monet presses the island's self-destruct button, causing a massive explosion that threatens everyone on Punk Hazard.
keyMoments.significance: Creates the climactic crisis of the Punk Hazard Arc and potentially marks Monet's death (though this is debated among fans).

reveals.information: Willing to sacrifice herself and destroy the entire island for Doflamingo's plans
Believes Doflamingo will become the next Pirate King

keyMoments.title: Regains Consciousness
keyMoments.description: After being defeated by Luffy, Caesar regains consciousness and realizes he still possesses what he believes to be Smoker's heart.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the tension for Caesar's attempt to take revenge by stabbing the heart.

name.japanese: ドンキホーテ・ドフラミンゴ

keyMoments.title: Farewell to Vergo
keyMoments.description: Doflamingo calls Vergo to thank him for his service and apologize for what is to come, calling him his longest companion.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals Doflamingo's genuine affection for Vergo despite his ruthless nature.

keyMoments.title: Orders Island Destruction
keyMoments.description: Doflamingo orders Monet to activate the self-destruct mechanism, willing to sacrifice his subordinates and destroy all evidence on Punk Hazard.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Doflamingo's ruthlessness and strategic thinking.

reveals.information: Has genuine affection for Vergo as his longest companion
Willing to sacrifice his own subordinates to destroy evidence

keyMoments.title: Sees Father Petrified
keyMoments.description: Momonosuke is shocked and horrified to see his father Kin'emon's body petrified by Caesar's Shinokuni gas.
keyMoments.significance: An emotional moment that highlights Momonosuke's fear for his father and sets up their eventual reunion.

relationships.description: Momonosuke is deeply concerned for his father's safety after seeing him petrified.

evolutionMoments.description: Momonosuke sees Kin'emon's petrified body brought into Room R.

keyMoments.title: Receives Farewell from Doflamingo
keyMoments.description: Vergo receives a final message from Doflamingo thanking him for his service. Even in pieces from Law's attack, Vergo smiles.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Vergo's loyalty and acceptance of his fate, foreshadowing his impending death.

reveals.information: Accepts his fate with a smile despite being cut in pieces

keyMoments.title: Returns with Sea Stone Handcuffs
keyMoments.description: Usopp arrives in Room R with the Sea Stone handcuffs and Caesar's former subordinates.
keyMoments.significance: Provides the means to restrain Caesar Clown for transport.
